ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ وَلْيَجِدُوا۟ فِيكُمْ غِلْظَةً وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! fight those of the kuffar who are near to you and let them find you implacable. Know that Allah is with those who have taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O believers, fight the unbelievers around you, and let them realise that you are firm: Remember, God is with those who are pious and obedient to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers! Fight against the unbelievers who live around you; and let them find in you sternness. Know that Allah is with the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, fight the unbelievers near you for the cause of God so that they realize your strength and know that God is with the pious ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe – fight the disbelievers who are near to you, and let them find severity in you, and know well that Allah is with the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! Fight those of the disbelievers who are close to you, and let them find harshness in you; and know that Allah is with those who have Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! fight those of the unbelievers who are near to you and let them find in you hardness; and know that Allah is with those who guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, fight the unbelievers who are near to you; and let them find in you a harshness; and know that God is with the godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! Fight those of the disbelievers who are near to you, and let them find harshness in you, and know that Allah is with those who keep their duty (unto Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Believers! Fight against those deniers of the truth who are near you.  Deal firmly with them. Know that God is with those who fear Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye who believe! fight the infidels who are near unto you, and surely let them find in you sternness, and know that Allah is with the God-fearing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! Fight the faithless who are in your vicinity, and let them find severity in you, and know that Allah is with the Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! fight the unbelievers who gird you about, and let them find firmness in you: and know that Allah is with those who fear Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! Fight those of the disbelievers who are close to you, and let them find harshness in you, and know that Allah is with those who are the Al-Muttaqun (the pious - see V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers, fight the unbelievers who are near you. Let them find firmness in you. Know that Allah is with those who are cautious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! Fight those of the disbelievers who attack you, and let them find severity in you, and know that God is with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, fight those adjacent to you of the disbelievers and let them find in you harshness. And know that Allah is with the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [9:123] O you who believe, fight those of the disbelievers who are near to you, that is, the nearest, followed by the next nearest of them, and let them find harshness in you, that is, severity, in other words, be harsh with them, and know that God is with the pious, helping and granting [them] victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe!) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (Fight those of the disbelievers who are near to you) the Banu Qurayzah, Banu'l-Nadir, Fadak and Khaybar, (and let them find harshness in you) toughness from you, (and know) believers (that Allah is with those who keep their duty (unto Him)) Allah helps the believers: Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions, by making them victorious over their enemies.
